column4: I'm looking to buy a new comp, has an integrated Nvidia GeForce 6150 SE in it.  will there be any complications with this video card an ubuntu 9.04?
usually nvidia doesnt have any problems, i don't know that specific model though
I too have not had problems with nvidia.. but am always leery of trusting the video card embedded in the motherboard.
as long as its nvidia you can always dl their official driver
